About Us

Dan's page is one of the different online page that gives tutorials in many ways. What makes it different is that,in every tutorials for each instrument is been taught by a single instructor.

This makes it different becoues, in other online lessons, is been taught by many instructrs and that makes it confussing sometimes.

One of the biggest different,however,is in the overall approcah and all of the lessons on Dan's page are not for sael but focuse on teaching you how to play, jam, and write music.We don't teach songs on this site, instead. You will get to know how thoes guitar parts where created in the first place and where they came about.
